ModMetaData.name: Wildlife Tab
ModMetaData.author: lincore
ModMetaData.description:
Version 17.0 for a17.1546
This mod adds a new tab that conveniently lists all wild animals. Animals belonging to a faction are excluded from this list (with the exception of the insectoid faction).
The version on the steam workshop will always target the latest stable release of RimWorld. Previous and unstable versions as well as the source for my mods can be found on github: https://github.com/lincore81/RimworldMods/
Thank you ShawnBuckley for providing the update to Alpha 16. Appreciate it!
Changes: 2017/05/23: - Update to A17. 2016/12/21: - Update to A16. 2016/10/16: - The window should now always have the correct height. 2016/09/09: - Trying to hunt/tame animals that are likely to retaliate (>= 20%/2% respectively) will now produce a visable and audible warning. - Added an info button to easily look up an animal's stats. 2016/09/07: - The manhunter-column has been generalized into a warning column. - Members of the insectoid faction (= infestation) are now included in the list. - Members of this faction are indicated by a special warning icon - Made sure hidden creatures will never be listed.
